```{r load data}

files <- list.files(here("raw_data"), pattern = "*.json", full.names = T)

df <- lapply(files, fromJSON)
res <- lapply(df, summary)


for(i in 1:length(df)){
  tmp_trials <- df[[i]]$answers$data
  data <- read.csv(textConnection(tmp_trials))
}
```
